column1: table #:  3 Percent distribution of expenditure for the justice system by level of government, fiscal 1996
series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts 1996, NCJ
data source:  Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (CJEE)
authors:  Sidra Lea Gifford and Sue Lindgren
Table 3.   Percent distribution of expenditure for the justice system by level of government, fiscal 1996
This table has been revised since its initial posting.
Notes:  Local government data are estimates subject to variability.
Population figures are from the Bureau of the Census, Current Population Reports, Series P-25, No. 1045, July 1996.
a/ Total direct expenditures include outlays of States and all types of local governments including independent school districts
and special districts, which are not displayed separately.   The "Local, total" lines, which include these districts, will not
equal the sum of the "Counties" and "Municipalities" lines.
